definition: numerical answer (to a question in math.)/(Tw) (of troops) to shout numbers or phrases in unison (to keep in step or maintain morale)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Every time I add these figures up I get a different answer.
sentences.chinese: 我每一次把這些數字加起來都得到區別的答數。

sentences.english: Other company little troops crying out the spirit answer with o o o.
sentences.chinese: 別連的小部隊嗡嗡嗡地喊著精神答數。
